title: Simply fabulous!
review: My family and I went to see 'Walk The Line' and we all loved it! I have to say - it's the best movie I've seen in a long time. This is very easily Reese Witherspoon's best performance ever! She was fabulous playing June Carter Cash. Joaquin Phoenix was awesome as Johnny Cash also! I loved this movie so much that we had to run to WalMart afterwards to get the soundtrack and a couple of Johnny's cd's. I also have to say I think Joaquin and Reese sing way better than Johnny and June. Wow, they could have potential singing careers if they wanted to. Bravo! The movie is getting high ratings, so it's not just me who liked this movie. Go check it out. You won't be disappointed! :)

title: Entertaining suspense thriller
review: We were entertained all the way thru this movie - from the very beginning. It was a very suspenseful movie with interesting characters.  I would definitely recommend this movie to any suspense thriller lover.

title: Excellent movie!
review: I thought this movie was really entertaining and funny.  I would highly recommend this one!!!  I thought Julia Roberts did a really good job, too. I can't wait to see this one again on video!  Lots of laughs here...

movie_title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
title: Excellent movie!
review: This movie was *much* better than I had thought it would be.  I expected a so-so film, but it was super funny and entertaining.  The whole audience was laughing all the way thru the movie.  This is the funniest movie I've seen in a long time.  Highly recommended!

title: JUST PLAIN AWFUL !!!
review: Avoid this DUMB movie like the plague!  Unless, of course, you think hearing the 'F' word in almost every sentence, repeated disgusting puke scenes, and a lame sense of humor is funny.  I was also repulsed by the sacriligious scenes.  (i.e.  A priest having sex with a demon-filled evil woman, for one example)  I have to give this one an F-

title: Excellent thriller!
review: This is one of the best thrillers I've ever seen!!!  I had to go back and see it again!  Most definitely a must-see!!!  The ending is powerful and has a great twist!  You won't be disappointed if you go see this one!
